oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Discussion - The Earl Scruggs Review - 2006-05-20 - Tape two
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Panel discussion on the Earl Scruggs Review from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on May 20, 2006. Tape two of two. In support of the exhibit Banjo Man: The Musical Journey of Earl Scruggs
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Earl Scruggs; Gary Scruggs; Randy Scruggs; Eddie Stubbs;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress. Audio excerpt from video -- Current projects for Gary and Randy -- Current projects for Earl -- Looking back on the time off the Review -- How the Review would like to be remembered -- Closing comments.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Scruggs, Earl; Scruggs, Randy; Scruggs, Gary; Stubbs, Eddie; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
